name: GalaxySoundsforSleep
0:
”Alexa open galaxy sounds”
”Alexa ask galaxy sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: galaxy sounds
des: With Galaxy Sounds, let the deep white noise of the milky way promote deep sleep and focus. Get started by saying, 'Alexa, open Galaxy Sounds,' and enjoy a 30-minute session of sound. It's an excellent feature to use during sleep, for deep relaxation, meditation practices, or to help concentrate on your tasks.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
